Recent Doc Updates

14-April-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Brightcove Player Sample: Display Duration
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn to display the duration of the video over the video poster that is displayed. The duration disappears when the play button is pressed.
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/code-samples/brightcove-player-sample-display-duration.html
  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Code Samples
  • Title: Seek Buttons Plugin
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about the seek buttons plugin for Brightcove Player. This plugin will allow you to seek forward/back through a video for a configurable amount of time. - New Product Feature!
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/seek-buttons-plugin.html
  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Plugins
